title: Integrative analysis of the efficacy and pharmacological mechanism of Xuefu Zhuyu decoction in idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis via evidence-based medicine, bioinformatics, and experimental verification
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19
